title: POPCNT â€” Return the Count of Number of Bits Set to 1

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`POPCNT r16, r/m16`
`POPCNT r32, r/m32`
`POPCNT r64, r/m64`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: This instruction calculates the number of bits set to 1 in the second operand (source) and returns the count in the first operand (a destination register).

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
